nodes.label: welcome and ask
utterances: Hello! This is tech support. How can I help you today?

nodes.label: reload
utterances: Try to reload your device.

nodes.label: check if helped
utterances: Has this resolved the issue for you?

nodes.label: verification
utterances: Try cleaning browser cache.

nodes.label: ask about additional problem
utterances: What is the other problem that you are experiencing?

nodes.label: solution for balance
utterances: Try logging out of the website and then re-logging in.

nodes.label: end
utterances: Thank you for contacting us, have a nice day.
The website loading takes too long
Sure, I will try that
No, it did not work
All right, I will try cleaning cache
Yes, that fixed everything
Actually, I'm having a different issue now
I've put some money on my account but the balance is not updated on the website
Ok, I will try to log out
The balance is updated but now the website is slow again

nodes.label: welcome
utterances: Welcome! Food Delivery Service. How can I help you today?

nodes.label: request order number
utterances: Could you provide your order number?

nodes.label: check order exists
utterances: Let me check this order number...
Sorry, I couldn't find this order number. Could you please verify and try again?

nodes.label: verify order
utterances: I found order #XYZ123 for pizza and pasta. Is this your order?

nodes.label: order status
utterances: Your order is being prepared and will be delivered to 123 Main St. Estimated delivery time is 45 minutes. Is this address correct?

nodes.label: update address
utterances: Please provide the correct delivery address.

nodes.label: confirm address
utterances: I've updated the delivery address. Is this correct now?

nodes.label: end
utterances: Thank you for choosing our service. Have a great meal!
I want to check my order status
My order number is XYZ123
Let me check again, my order number is...
Order found
No, that's not my order
Yes, that's correct
No, the address is wrong
Yes, that's correct
The correct address is 456 Oak Street
No, that's still not correct
Yes, that's correct now

dialogues.topic: Basic happy path with correct order and address

nodes.label: welcome
utterances: Welcome to the City Library! How may I assist you today?

nodes.label: request_card_number
utterances: Could you please provide your library card number?

nodes.label: ask_book_details
utterances: What book are you looking for?

nodes.label: check_availability
utterances: Let me check if the book is currently available.

nodes.label: book_available
utterances: I've checked and the book is available.

nodes.label: book_unavailable
utterances: I've checked and the book is currently unavailable.

nodes.label: offer_alternatives
utterances: Would you like to place a hold, or would you prefer to see similar books that are available now?

nodes.label: place_hold
utterances: I've placed a hold on the book for you. You'll be notified by email when it becomes available. Would you like to search for any other books?

nodes.label: show_similar
utterances: We have similar books available: 'This Side of Paradise' and 'The Beautiful and Damned'. Would you like to check out any of them?

nodes.label: checkout_process
utterances: Would you like to check it out now?

nodes.label: confirm_checkout
utterances: I've checked out the book to your account. It's due in 3 weeks. Would you like to search for any other books?

nodes.label: end
utterances: Thank you for using our library services. Have a great day!
I'd like to borrow a book
My card number is L123456
I'm looking for The Great Gatsby
Okay, please check
Okay, please check
Great, I'd like to proceed
Oh, I see
I'd like to place a hold
I'd like to see similar books
Yes, I'd like to find another book
No, that's all for today
Yes, I'll take 'This Side of Paradise'
No, I'd like to look for something else
Yes, I'd like to check it out
Yes, I'd like to find another book
No, that's all for today

nodes.label: welcome
utterances: Welcome to AutoCare Service Center! How can I help you today?

nodes.label: request_car_info
utterances: Could you please provide your car's make, model and year?

nodes.label: ask_service_type
utterances: What type of service do you need? We offer diagnostics, repairs, and routine maintenance.

nodes.label: check_schedule
utterances: Let me check our available time slots for this service.

nodes.label: offer_times
utterances: We have slots available tomorrow at 10 AM or Friday at 2 PM. Which would you prefer?

nodes.label: suggest_urgent
utterances: I notice this is a critical repair. We have an urgent slot available today at 4 PM with a 20% rush fee. Would you like this option, or prefer a regular appointment next week?

nodes.label: confirm_appointment
utterances: I've scheduled your appointment. Would you like to add any additional services while your car is here?

nodes.label: suggest_additional
utterances: While your car is here, we recommend an oil change and filter replacement. Would you like to add these services?

nodes.label: provide_estimate
utterances: The estimated cost for all services will be $X. Would you like to proceed with the appointment?

nodes.label: end
utterances: Your appointment is confirmed. We'll see you then. Have a great day!
I need to schedule a car service
I have a 2020 Toyota Camry
I need brake repair
Okay, please check availability
Alright, what are my options?
Friday at 2 PM works for me
Yes, I'll take the urgent slot
No, I'll take a regular appointment
What other services would you recommend?
No additional services needed
Yes, add the oil change please
No, just the original service
Actually, I'd like to change the service type
Yes, that works for me

messages.text: Welcome to AutoCare Service Center! How can I help you today?
I need to schedule a car service
Could you please provide your car's make, model and year?
I have a 2020 Toyota Camry
What type of service do you need? We offer diagnostics, repairs, and routine maintenance.
I need brake repair
Let me check our available time slots for this service.
Alright, what are my options?
I notice this is a critical repair. We have an urgent slot available today at 4 PM with a 20% rush fee. Would you like this option, or prefer a regular appointment next week?
No, I'll take a regular appointment
We have slots available tomorrow at 10 AM or Friday at 2 PM. Which would you prefer?
Friday at 2 PM works for me
I've scheduled your appointment. Would you like to add any additional services while your car is here?
No additional services needed
The estimated cost for all services will be $X. Would you like to proceed with the appointment?
Yes, that works for me
Your appointment is confirmed. We'll see you then. Have a great day!

nodes.label: start
utterances: Good evening, how can I help?
How long are you going to stay?
We have a vacant room. Do you need anything else?
Unfortunately we do not have a vacant room for these dates, but we can offer two separate single rooms. Would this be acceptable?
Okay, now I need your ID card.
Can I help you with anything else?
Thank you. This is your key, have a good stay!
Okay, goodbye!
I want to book a duplex room
One night
Three nights
No, thanks
Okay, it will do
No, thanks, this does not suit me
Here it is
No, thanks

messages.text: Good evening, how can I help?
I want to book a duplex room
How long are you going to stay?
One night
We have a vacant room. Do you need anything else?
No, thanks
Okay, now I need your ID card.
Here it is
Thank you. This is your key, have a good stay!

dialogues.topic: book a room for one night

messages.text: Good evening, how can I help?
I want to book a duplex room
How long are you going to stay?
Three nights
Unfortunately we do not have a vacant room for these dates, but we can offer two separate single rooms. Would this be acceptable?
Okay, it will do
Okay, now I need your ID card.
Here it is
Thank you. This is your key, have a good stay!

dialogues.topic: book a room for two people for three nights

messages.text: Good evening, how can I help?
I want to book a duplex room
How long are you going to stay?
Three nights
Unfortunately we do not have a vacant room for these dates, but we can offer two separate single rooms. Would this be acceptable?
No, thanks, this does not suit me
Can I help you with anything else?
No, thanks
Okay, goodbye!

dialogues.topic: book a room for two people, no vacant rooms
